amendment.description: An amendment numbered 100 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to reduce the salary of White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 257, 1 Present (Roll no. 641).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 257, 1 Present (Roll no. 641).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
